A tag is assigned to content after it is [created](../create/index.qmd).

## Assign a tag


A content identifier and tag identifier is required to assign a tag.

::: {.panel-tabset group="language"}

### Python

```{python}

CONTENT_ITEM_GUID = '95f0b367-0eb5-4a8f-a9a8-4a531f00f712'
TAG_ID = "100"

response = client.post(f"/v1/content/{CONTENT_GUID}/tags", json={
    'tag_id': TAG_ID,
})

tags = response.json()
print(tags)
```
